As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences, but here are some popular South Indian films featuring Asin that you may want to check out:

1. Ghajini (2005) - This Tamil film, which was later remade in Hindi with the same name, is considered one of Asin's best performances. She played the lead role of a medical student who falls in love with a businessman with short-term memory loss.

2. Amma Nanna O Tamila Ammayi (2003) - Asin played the female lead in this Telugu film, which was a commercial and critical success. She played a traditional South Indian girl who falls in love with a Tamil-speaking man.

3. Majaa (2005) - Asin starred in the Tamil comedy-drama, Majaa, along with actor Vikram. The film was well-received by the audience and Asin's performance was praised for her comic timing.

4. Dasavathaaram (2008) - Asin played a dual role in this Tamil film, which also starred Kamal Haasan. She portrayed a Brahmin girl and a Punjabi village girl, displaying her versatility as an actor.

5. Pokkiri (2007) - Asin played the female lead in this Tamil action film, which also starred actor Vijay. The film was a commercial success and Asin's performance was praised for her chemistry with the lead actor.
